body_html:
@aluo-x: No, because I need a CUDA enabled build.
@peterjc123 : Ok thanks, appreciate all your work! Let me know when you think it is building and I'll test right away. I'm assuming now that we can build the core source, we'll also be able to build external torch ffi modules?

body:
@aluo-x: No, because I need a CUDA enabled build.
@peterjc123 : Ok thanks, appreciate all your work! Let me know when you think it is building and I'll test right away. I'm assuming now that we can build the core source, we'll also be able to build external torch ffi modules?
